title: Federal Reserve Cuts Rates 25 Basis Points But Signals Fewer Cuts in 2025 – Markets Tumble
shortdescription: Fed delivers final 2024 rate cut but projects only two cuts in 2025, down from four – inflation concerns persist.

author: Macro Anton

title: China Unveils Aggressive Stimulus Package – Shifts to 'Moderately Loose' Monetary Policy

description: China shifts to 'moderately loose' policy for first time since 2010 — $280B+ stimulus to combat property crisis.
author: Macro Anton

title: European Central Bank Cuts Rates for Fourth Time – Euro Weakens as Recession Fears Grow
shortdescription: ECB lowers deposit rate to 3% as eurozone economy stagnates – Germany in technical recession.
